markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m a Software Developer, a husband, and a dog owner from Córdoba, Argentina. I began my journey in tech working as a native Android…
markdownRemark.html:
I’m a Software Developer, a husband, and a dog owner from Córdoba, Argentina. I began my journey in tech working as a native Android developer. During this period of time I worked for a couple of startups, where I leared how to work in a fast-moving work environment.

I became a goal-oriented person, with a great passion for what I do. I then decided I wanted to expand my knowledge in other fields, so I started learning web development with Javascript. As a consequence, I got to participate in web and mobile/web projects and gain more experience.

As of today, I’m still constantly learning and hoping I can make enough time to get into AI / Machine Learning. Sometimes I also write on my blog about things that I care about.

frontmatter.title: JS guide for Java developers: Part 1 — scope, closures, global context, this, and undefined
